name: Angels and Demons: Journey to the Other Side
name_original: Angels and Demons: Journey to the Other Side
description:
War is brewing. Who will win; Angels, Demons, or Warlocks?

You decide. 

In this 3D adventure  you can decide to play as the Angel Oscar, and fight to save your kidnapped brother. Alternatively, claim victory as the mighty Demon Princess. Real time combat and parkour mechanics breathe life into this fresh take on the RPG format, made in under a week for the Unreal Engine 4 Jam.
